title: Drawing, The left half of a frieze, 1825–50
title_raw: The left half of a frieze
medium: Pencil, brush, sepia, yellow watercolor, paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Horizontal rectangle. The half-figure of a griffon with a rinceau standing beside a foliated candelabrum with a burning fire on top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, The left half of a frieze, 1825–50. Pencil, brush, sepia, yellow watercolor, paper. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-4259-1.
